AMMDSPersonal Media Data Management Platform

Private Exclusive Data Platform

Quick Start
Official Website
GitHub
🎬

Media

Easily manage your personal media library, support multiple video formats, automatically scrape metadata, and create your exclusive media library.

👤

Actors

Automatically identify actor information in media works, provide detailed actor profiles and work lists, making it easy to search and browse.

📄

Metadata

Automatically fetch metadata for media works from the internet, including covers, synopses, ratings, etc., enriching your media library information.

📤

Sharing

Support sharing your media library with friends or family, easily share your media collection, and create a home theater experience.

🔌

Plugin Integration

Provide extensive plugin support, easily integrate with existing media servers or players, and expand more functionalities.

🌐

Multi-Source Scraping

Support scraping media information from multiple data sources, ensuring comprehensive and accurate data.

🤖

Smart Matching

Automatically match local files with online metadata through intelligent algorithms, reducing manual operations and improving organization efficiency.

🖥️

Cross-Platform Support

Support running on multiple platforms such as Windows, macOS, and Linux, manage your media library anytime, anywhere.

Technical support provided by Xinjiang Mengsen Software Development Studio
